skills.name: Serenity
skills.description: Attacks the enemy 2 times and removes a beneficial effect with a 30% chance on each strike.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +15%

skill_effect.name: Remove Buff
skill_effect.description: Removes one or more beneficial effects from target monster(s)

skills.name: Overwhelm
skills.description: Attacks all enemies and increases their cooldowns by 1 turn each with a 70% chance.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%
Cooltime Turn -1

skill_effect.name: AOE
skill_effect.description: Applies skill to more than one target

skill_effect.name: Increase Cooltime
skill_effect.description: Puts the target's skill on cool down.

skills.name: Hellfire
skills.description: Decreases the HP of yourself and the enemy target by 30% each with a flame and decreases the HP by 15% each if it's a Boss. Inflicts great damage to the target and creates a shield that's 30% of the inflicted damage for 3 turns afterwards.

skill_effect.name: Self-Harm
skill_effect.description: Deals damage to the monster using the skill.

skill_effect.name: Shield
skill_effect.description: A shield is created to absorb a portion of incoming damage
